name: amasty/module-request-a-quote-lite-subscription-package
description: Request a Quote Lite Subscription Package by Amasty

suggest.amasty/module-request-a-quote-graphql: Install module-request-a-quote-graphql module to activate Graphql and Request a Quote compatibility
suggest.amasty/module-request-quote-hyva: Install this module to activate the integration Request a Quote with Hyva Theme.
suggest.amasty/module-hide-price-hyva: Install this module to activate the integration Hide Price with Hyva Theme.
